duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand, trace, record, audit, and settle all CeFi, DeFi, NFT, and any crypto related transactions and investments.
Reconcile and validate trade capture and day trading activity.
Research, build, and implement best practices around risk management.
Prepare and deliver P&L and pricing statements.
Work cross functionally with accounting and legal department.
Maintain integrity and confidentiality of all trade related data.
Provide excellent and outstanding customer service.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
